long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An advanced search extension that can be accessed from any browser tab, making searching much more efficient. Users can include or exclude specific words or phrases from their search, or search for specific file types. Users can also search for images with specific filetypes, sizes, colours, usage licenses, and time posted, while filtering to include or exclude specific words or phrases.
Version 2.0:
Fully debugged image search function.
Patched bugs with filetype, usage license, time filters.
